attributes.action: withdraw guidelines from the NCB concerning racism in young children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Signs such as a toddler saying "yuk" at foreign cuisine is apparantly a sign of racism. Given that toddlers turn their noses up at most foods this is absurd and yet another victory for the pathetic PC brigade who would see this country brought to it's knees. The Prime Minister should denounce these guidelines for the drivel they are and make sure a similar incident doesn't happen again.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
